Text.Value: A dragon-rider. My kin are hunting - blood will be spilled.
Blasted wyrm - where did it come from?
We stand no chance against such a foe. We should get out of sight!
Stay low - it might not see us.
The size of that thing. Looks so much bigger when it's flying above you...
Let's hope we don't catch its eye.
Beautiful. And terrifying.
Hope it doesn't see us.
A dragon-rider - my kin are near.
Blasted wyrm - where did it come from?
We stand no chance against such a foe. We should get out of sight!
It's absolutely massive.
The size of that thing. Looks so much bigger when it's flying above you...
By the dead gods - it's so much bigger than I remember.
Such fury. I do not envy the dragon's prey.
It's huge.

EditorData.NodeContext: (Responding to previous speaker) unnerved at the sight of a dragon flying overhead

Text.Value: A red dragon. Look at the power in that body.
My word, a red dragon. Majestic. And malignant.
Look at that. Red dragon. Evil, but beautiful.
A dragon. Hells above - quite literally.
A red dragon - here? What a thrill!
Look at that beast. Seems almost too big to take flight.
Blasted wyrm - where did it come from?
We stand no chance against such a foe. We should get out of sight!
That thing could swallow us in a gulp.
The size of that thing. Looks so much bigger when it's flying above you...
Try not to catch its eye. Unless you fancy an inside view of its gullet.
Only a fool would resist such power.
That thing could swallow each of us whole.
You go a lifetime without seeing one, and then they won't stop pestering you.
I suggest we admire it from afar.
Stay low - it might not see us.
It would be too much to hope that's nothing to do with us, wouldn't it?
I tangled with a dragon once. Never forgot it.
If only I was mounted on that dragon.
Hopefully it comes no closer.
You go a lifetime without seeing one, and then they won't stop pestering you.
I suggest we admire it from afar.
That thing could swallow us in a gulp.
It would be too much to hope that's nothing to do with us, wouldn't it?
I tangled with a dragon once. Never forgot it.
Such beauty. Such power.
A thing like that could swallow each of us whole - raw or incinerated.
You go a lifetime without seeing one, and then they won't stop pestering you.
I suggest we admire it from afar.
It's absolutely massive.
It would be too much to hope that's nothing to do with us, wouldn't it?
I tangled with a dragon once. Never forgot it.
The skill of a dragon-rider - breathtaking.
Damn thing could blot out the sun.
Dragon! Look out!
A red dragon! Gods, it must have followed us from Avernus!
Red dragon! Take cover!
Hells. Not another dragon. Anything but a dragon.
A red dragon? That can only mean trouble.
A dragon. Gods preserve me.

EditorData.NodeContext: Unnerved at the sight of a dragon flying overhead

Synopsis: A dragon flies over the party. They may or may not  recognise it. If they're a gith, they'll always recognise it and suppose that their kin must be operating nearby.
